text: Pirom Un-Prasert () (born 16 November 1953) is a retired international football referee from Thailand. He is best known for refereeing the 1997 FIFA Confederations Cup FinalFIFA. "Match Report - Brazil - Australia 6:0 (3:0)". December 21, 1997. Retrieved on April 19, 2013. and two matches in the 1998 FIFA World Cup in France; the Norway-Morocco and Paraguay-Nigeria matches in the first round.RSSSF. "World Cup 1998 finals". Retrieved on April 19, 2013. He also officiated at the 1995 FIFA Women's World Cup,FIFA."Match Report - Nigeria - Canada 3:3". June 8, 1995. Retrieved on April 19, 2013. the 1996 Olympic tournament in Atlanta,FIFA. "Match Report - France - Spain 1:1 (1:0)". July 22, 1996. Retrieved on April 19, 2013. the 1996 AFC Asian Cup,Courtney, Barrie. "Asian Nations Cup 1996 Final Tournament - Extended File". RSSSF, December 15, 2006. Retrieved on April 19, 2013. and eight matches in 1998 World Cup qualifiers.FIFA. "World Cup referees to clamp down on dangerous tackles". June 6, 1998. title: Pirom Un-prasert
